name: Planter (Shimonster)
description:
Move around and click on plants to use their attacks and kill all the bugs in each wave. You can also bait plants with plant food. For more information, play the tutorial level.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Eat Fly: E

Use Plant: Left Click

Plant Plant Food: Right Click

Pause: ESC or P
